familyMemberEthics.description: In 2017, Pres. Trump earned $201 - $1,000 in royalties income from Universal City Studios LLC from movies/television (The Little Rascals). All other royalties generated less than $200 of income. Location: New York, NY. Value not readily ascertainable.  Separately with Universal City Studios, residuals from appearances on Saturday Night Live and Late Night with Jimmy Fallon) have been divested.
